metadata.title: CVE-2022-41684 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A heap out of bounds read vulnerability exists in the OpenImageIOmaster-branch-9aeece7a when parsing the image file directory part of a PSDimage file. A specially-crafted .psd file can cause a read of arbitrarymemory address which can lead to denial of service. An attacker can providea malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
